text: our investigators and analysts have
gained a greater understanding of the
recent movements and activities of the
sea shooter Aaron Alexis as was already
known alexis was employed as a
contractor for a private information
technology firm pursuant to his
employment he was assigned to a project
at the Washington Navy Yard and he
arrived in the Washington DC area on
August 25th during a stay in this area
Alexis resided at local hotels and began
working at the Washington Navy Yard on
sep tember night on Saturday September
14th Alexis purchased a Remington 870
shotgun and ammunition at a gun shop and
Northern Virginia on the same day Alexis
also purchased the hacksaw among other
items at a home improvement store in
Northern Virginia on the morning of
monday September 16th Alexis arrived at
the Washington Navy Yard and entered a
parking garage at 753 a.m. and as a
rental car as we advise last week he had
legitimate access to the Navy Yard as a
result of his work as a contractor
and he utilized the valid pass to gain
entry to building 197 at 808 a.m.
shortly after his arrival in the
building and over the course of
approximately one hour Alexis shot and
killed 12 victims and wounded four
surviving victims before he was shot and
killed by law enforcement officers
investigation today has determined that
Alexis acted alone there are indicators
that alexis was prepared to die during
the attack and that he accepted death as
the inevitable consequence of his
actions there is no indication today
that alexis was targeting specific
individuals there have been widespread
reports and speculation surrounding
Alexis's mental health history and
reported behaviors indicative of severe
mental illness as we seek to better
understand his pathway to violence we
will continue to explore his background
and motivations including his clinical
history at this point I can confirm that
there are multiple indicators that
Alexis how the delusional belief that he
was being controlled or influenced by
extremely low frequency for e.l.f
electromagnetic waves the etching of
quote my ELF weapon close quote on the
left side of the receiver of the
Remington 870 shotgun is believed to
reference these electromagnetic waves
in addition a document retrieved from
the electronic media stated quote
ultra-low frequency attack is what I've
been subject to for the last three
months and to be perfectly honest that
is what has driven me to this
